title: Watch: Dunkin' customer pulls up to the drive-thru and catches two employees in the middle of a bloody brawl
description:
We've all been there. You need your fix of caffeine to get you through the day. You pull up to Dunkin' because that's where real America gets coffee and f*ck Starbucks. You get your coffee, maybe a donut, and are on your way. Where most of us haven't been is doing all those things, but also catching two employees in the midst of a bloody brawl.

This guy did. And because he rules and remembers to do it FOR THE CONTENT, he had his smartphone out.

pic.twitter.com/FvFGCHgO9G
— Clown World ™ 🤡 (@ClownWorld_) November 23, 2022

Someone needs to make me a .gif of Joey Styles screaming "CATFIGHT! CATFIGHT! CATFIGHT!" It's a failure of the entire internet that one doesn't exist. 2022 has blessed us with many reasons why such a .gif would come in handy.

The hero is my man here working the drive-thru like nothing is going on. Other than Becki and Karen are at it again. He even through up the deuces at the guy capturing the content.

Open for discussion is what was the triggering action that set it off. I want it to be a lover's quarrel between the two ladies and the manager trying to break it up. The one without the bloody face found out he was cheating on her with the one whose face was bloody.

But I'm open to being convinced otherwise. Use the response/comment section of whatever social media app brought you here to opine with your theories.

title: 'Leave your f***in politics at the state line': Kid Rock GOES OFF on Californians bringing their crap to red states
description:
There are way too many progressives bringing their progressive stink to blue states, and Kid Rock has a message for them. F*ck off with that sh*t.

At issue is Hank Williams' house (shout out to Whiskey Riff). It was bought by a Californian who told people he was going to preserve it as a landmark. Instead, the house has been neglected. It's falling apart. And that same Californians might be reneging on his word and tearing it down. Whether or not the Californian had any honest plans to preserve the house, Kid Rock has thoughts.

Kid Rock speaks out on potential destruction of Hank Williams' antebellum home youtu.be

They come here leaving these woke policies from these cities, you know, for better schools, lower taxes, lower crime, that you’ve talked about a million times, and we tell ’em, leave your effin’ politics at the state line.

It's not new that 'dumb liberals' do this. New Yorkers have been doing it for decades. They vote for sh*tty Democrat politicians who raise their taxes and make the cost of living unaffordable. Then they move to the south where they... vote for those same politicians who raise taxes and make the cost of living unaffordable. Then they move to the midwest, and so on and so forth.

Things have been exacerbated during the pandemic when the leftist politicians these dinkuses keep voting for got to live out their soggiest social fantasies by shutting everything down and putting the government in charge of as many aspects of your lives as possible.

So, again:

There is a reason these people are leaving their progressive paradises. It's because they aren't paradises. That the "progressive" part of it is the problem is something that needs to be explained to them very slowly.

title: Watch: Legend edits together the ultimate 'AOC and Elon Love Story,' and Elon Musk approves
description:
Joannie and Chachi. Joey and Pacey. Felicity and Oliver. It's a popular story arc in pop culture. A boy and a girl start off as rivals. They have a certain spark everyone except for them sees. And the audience knows that in the end... they're gonna smash. On Twitter, one of those budding relationships is blossoming before our very eyes. He's a billionaire entrepreneur who purchased a social media platform. She's a social media influencer who only exists because of that platform. It's Elon Musk and Rep. AOC: A Love Story.

As Twitter user Maze shows us in this video, the billionaire and the silly girl have undeniable chemistry.

Elon Musk and AOC finally worked out their differences.

The chemistry these two have is crazy. pic.twitter.com/4dYzYAinqa
— Maze (@mazemoore) November 23, 2022

Even Elon Musk approves! And he selected the perfect emoji.

🫶
— Elon Musk (@elonmusk) November 23, 2022

Let's be frank. Everyone reading this knows what those eyes mean:

The seeds of this forbidden romance were planted earlier in 2022. Rep. AOC's consistent attacks against successful people come across as economic illiteracy and best and her being a dunderbrain at worst. If you look a little deeper, the silly things she says are to mask her feelings for Elon. It was up to Musk to say out loud what everyone else sees.

Stop hitting on me, I’m really shy ☺️
— Elon Musk (@elonmusk) April 29, 2022

Rep. AOC can deny many things. Reality. Basic facts. That her current fiancé likes her for her brain. The social media influencer can't deny Elon's charm.

You’re welcome
— Elon Musk (@elonmusk) November 18, 2022

As of this writing, social media influencer Rep. AOC has yet to comment publically on Maze's masterpiece or Elon's public approval of his work. She's sitting somewhere in DC scribbling "Mr. and Mrs. Rep. AOC" in her diary. And debating doing that thing where she texts Elon but pretends she meant to text someone else.

We here at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website wish the two of them the best and pray that it all works out for them.

title: Lesbian writer hired to write anti-JK Rowling hit-piece is shocked to discover the author ISN'T transphobic
description:
An unknown outlet wanted an anti-JK Rowling hit piece written. Who better to write it than a lesbian? After all, JK Rowling is -phobic. The internet says so. EJ Rosetta, who has written for various LGBTQAIIP+ outlets like Pink News and the Huffington Post, set out to write about how JK Rowling is a transphobe who everyone is done with. To Rosetta's surprise, it turns out Rowling is not transphobic and the internet was wrong.

Rosetta isn't the first person who couldn't name a single transphobic thing Rowling said. But she is the first who admitted so. She shared her journey to discovery in a Twitter thread.

Right, I’m done.

3 months ago, I was tasked with writing an article detailing “20 Transphobic JK Rowling Quotes We’re Done With”

After 12 weeks of reading her books, tweets, full essay & finding the context of these “quotes”, I’ve not found a single truly transphobic message🧵
— E J Rosetta (@ejrosetta) November 22, 2022

I'm blown away that there are news editors who ASSIGN clickbait. Any idiot can collect things someone else said, throw in a few .gifs, and call it a blog post. I know this because I am that idiot.

JK saw the loopholes being created & knew that women needed a voice. So instead of sitting back & wishing everyone well, said “It’s got to be me, hasn’t it?”. She did something terrifying & amazing & used her voice, I suspect knowing damn well what was to come.

That’s bravery.🧵
— E J Rosetta (@ejrosetta) November 22, 2022

Some of those loopholes include police putting rapists who have male genitalia into prisons with women who have female genitalia. That's what critics call "transphobic."

Since Rowling started her crusade, we now tell biological girls -- including teenagers -- that if they have a problem with seeing another woman's penis, they need to shut up about it or have their lives destroyed. Also, we now say things like "another woman's penis." It's not me. It's the AP style guide.

Rowling chose the side of women who were born that way. Activists went berserk. One of those activists made the mistake of assigning the ultimate "JK Rowling is Over Party" article to someone intellectually honest enough to see through it.

Shame on those who have framed her under the guise of “reporting” when you must know, deep down, you are just chucking out clickbait & stirring up hate. Shame on those who followed that propaganda without critical thought.

You’re burning the wrong witch. I stand with @jk_rowling
— E J Rosetta (@ejrosetta) November 22, 2022

What I find most amusing about this thread is the fact this post is still going to be written by someone else. Instead of ",20 Transphobic JK Rowling Quotes We’re Done With” it might be "14 Transphobic JK Rowling Tweets That Proves She Stinks.” They'll pretend EJ Rosetta's threat calling out the bullsh*t doesn't exist and act as if the internet doesn't know any better.

Also, "LGB without the T" equals "LGB" equals "Let's Go Brandon" equals "F*ck Joe Biden." I saw that on Twitter somewhere and it cracks me up.

Editor’s Note

title: Watch: Elon Musk uncovers secret Twitter merch room that tells you all you need to know about Twitter
description:
If we are to believe media reports, Twitter will be dead any day now. The employees who have been fired by Elon Musk and who hated Elon Musk before getting fired say so. And, they say so to journalismers who also hate Elon Musk because Twitter is now the only social media platform leftists don't control the flow of information on.

Corners are being cut. Lunches are no longer free. Though, as energy costs skyrocket as we enter the cold San Francisco winter, Elon has at the very least found a new source of clean and affordable energy.

Burning these.

Found in closet at Twitter HQ fr 🤣🤣 pic.twitter.com/3xSI3KvvHk
— Elon Musk (@elonmusk) November 23, 2022

A closet full of #StayWoke t-shirts. It's almost a little too on the nose.

It's funny when you think about it. Talk to anyone in conservative media and they'll tell you they've seen a massive increase in engagement in traffic as of late. Coincidentally, it started around the same Elon bought Twitter and fired the people we always assumed were throttling our traffic. The same people you can hear crying and whining, many times as an unnamed source close to the matter who wishes to remain anonymous, that they are no longer able to throttle traffic anymore.

It's been less than a month, and Elon has managed to confirm everything we thought we knew was happening behind the scenes at Twitter. A closet full of #StayWoke shirts is the perfect visual aid.

title: Watch: Because it's Thanksgiving Eve, here's Tulsi Gabbard and Jocko jamming out to the White Stripes
description:
One quick lap around the internet and I can already tell it's another day of everything sucks, everything is terrible, and "oh my God, someone do something." So as we here at the Louder with Crowder Dot Com website drink our coffee and attempt to determine what we can opine on that won't get us throttled by Facebook (hint: f*ck all), please enjoy the following musical interlude. Tulsi Gabbard and Jocko Willink jamming out to the White Stripes.

View this post on Instagram
A post shared by Jocko Willink (@jockowillink)

"Fall is here, hear the yell,
Back to school, ring the bell,
Brand new shoes, walking blues,
Climb the fence, books and pens,
I can tell that we are gonna be friends..."

I share this for two reasons. One, The White Stripes frontman Jack Whitte is the latest celebrity you've forgotten about to make a big dramatic exit from Twitter. White went on a lengthy anti-Elon Musk rant via his Instagram Page:

Why don't you be truthful? Tell it like it is; people like you and Joe Rogan (who gives platforms to liars
like Alex Jones etc.); you come into a ton of money, see the tax bill, despise paying your fair share, and then
think moving to Texas and supporting whatever republican you can is going to help you keep more of your
money.

Since Jack White dislikes people who have opposing viewpoints from him, you know he's going to hate having someone like Tulsi Gabbard, who made news in 2022 for leaving the anti-science party of hatred and intolerance known as the Democratic Party, playing one of his tunes.

The other reason is that it's Thanksgiving Eve, and we should all be thankful for our friends. Thank you Jocko and Tulsi for reminding America of that.
